about_the_game:
Over 200 Unique Monsters!
A massive RPG with an abundance of rich content.

Train your monsters to save little JUJU, who was transformed into a Yukomon after an accident at the laboratory. In this world, there are ancient creatures known as Yukomons. Unlike regular animals, they possess unique abilities and a mysterious connection to the Yukotrix, an artifact from an ancient civilization that holds the key to evolution.

Face off against over 100 unique trainers and interact with characters tied to the secrets of this world.

Fight against Team T, controlled by the DeChamps Corporation, whose goal is to create a world free of humans, inhabited only by Yukomons. To achieve this, they will stop at nothing to kidnap little JUJU, the human who evolved into a Yukomon.

Make unique friends, battle powerful researchers, and enhance the power of your Yukotrix. Catch Yukomons while fishing, plant recovery items in a more user-friendly and fast-paced system, and uncover the secrets of evolution.

Features:

  • Monster Capture RPG

  • Collect over 200 unique Yukomons and fight relentlessly to save your sister!

  • Gain EXP by battling wild Yukomons or trainers.

  • With the introduction of genetic bases, you can freely allocate EXP to your favorite Yukomon!

  • Uncover the truth and secrets hidden in this world!

  • Explore the hidden secrets of this world, gradually revealing its truth!

  • Over 200 monsters

  • Use Genetic Bases to level up the monsters of your choice

  • Pixel art for each character

  • Character illustrations relevant to the story

  • Have a Monster Index -  YUKOPEDIA

  • Obtain unique powers linked to the Yukotrix or the ability to use special items.

  • Minimalistic interface for items

  • Farming system included

  • Fishing system included

  • Mining system included

  • Unique powers and items tied to your progression – skateboard, kayak, investigation, strength, and more

  • Yukotrix, an ancient mechanism that allows you to enhance your Yukomons' strength (level and evolution)

  • Weather interactions that signal the presence of divine Yukomons

  • Day-night cycle with different Yukomons appearing in each period

Try CHEAT mode and become the infiltrated villain of Team T, with vast resources, a divine Yukomon with a devastating attack that destroys any and all enemies, and a 100% capture rate. But a hero sacrifices himself to save his sister—taking the easy path was never an option, was it?

All Yukomons are hand-drawn, featuring unique moves and powers with thousands of possible strategies!

A massive RPG with an abundance of rich content.

name: YUKOMON

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.0 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card compatible with DirectX 9.0c (e.g., NVIDIA GeForce 6600 or equivalent)
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or equivalent (or any newer model)
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card

short_description: The protagonist's life changes when their 5-year-old sister is transformed into a Yukomon. The only cure is to complete the genetic search for the 200 cataloged Yukomons, but Team T is ready to sabotage their journey.
